ygData.subject: Re: Wicked Blades in the Dark!!
ygData.msgSnippet: You were right.  I did delete that post and I rewrote it.  Tucson hasn t moved, he s signalled Noctorro to move in slowly, and in phases.  He s going to now

You were right.  I did delete that post and I rewrote it.  Tucson hasn't mo=
ved, he's signalled Noctorro to move in slowly, and in phases.  He's going =
to now stand back and let the fuzors begin their work.  But he's also going=
 to give the impression of complete surrender at the same time.  

Meanwhil=
e, Uproar and Quickstride are completely at a loss as to how to fix things =
at the Ark.  And now, they're going to look up to Rodimus to do the right t=
hing.  Both of them are rookie Maximals, so do expect some comic relief fro=
m those two.  Uproars biggest weakness is his perpetual curiosity which is =
harmless enough but often gets him into sticky situations.  Quickstride's w=
eakness is often his scatterbrained nature, which also provides a little co=
mic relief.  If Rodimus can put these two guys on the right track, then he =
shouldn't have any reasons to doubt himself as a leader.

Hope this helps. =
BTW, Tucson is willing to meet with Legacy, on neutral grounds, but feels i=
t's best that Legacy does leave the Ark for saftey purposes.  Remember, he =
does have that weakness for losing his temper, and he may have made it soun=
d rather harsh, when he informed Legacy that he was to vacate the Ark.  But=
 in doing so, he could privately meet with the bot to try and get an idea a=
s to what page he's actually on, and why he's doing what he's doing.  And i=
f he has indeed turned evil.  Tucson is extremely confused as to why Legacy=
 would intentionally harm his comrades, and he's hiding confusion behind hi=
s anger.  But he will not make any violent actions against him, he just wan=
ts honest answers.  

Okay, that's definitely it for now.    Haven't gone t=
his far yet, just something to run by you before we go with it.
